help-file.title: THROWPOTION
help-file.content:
SYNTAX : throwpotion <potion> <target>
Once you have mixed your potion, you will want to throw it at your target, and to do this, the potion you wish to throw must be in your inventory. Your accuracy at hitting your victim, instead of others in your group or even yourself will grow with your skill and level. As an example, if you had a chill touch potion and you wished to throw it at the mob in the room called "hunter", type: throwpotion chill hunter
